title: I was wrongfully permabanned.
body:
Dear Riot Games,
I was permabanned as of November 27th, 2016. I do feel as if my behavior was ban worthy, but not permaban worthy. I understand I have done a wrong but  I have supported Riot games and played league of legends for years, and would really like to reform my behavior. I will post the chat logs later pls unban me rito.
Edit: Logs Game 1
TheFoxGuardian: Dont ban my champs when they're highlighted :)

replies.body:
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=TheFoxGuardian
I'm pretty sure that twitch game where you went 0/18, bought only tears and mobi boots is permaban worthy, especially if you did it in ranked.

During your 14-day ban, it has been stated clearly that your next punishment will be a permaban if you didn't reform. 

So if you ignore that, then tough luck. Account is gone.
I never got a 14 day ban, and the only time that I've been chat restricted was 2-3 years ago, so this was pretty much a first offense permanent ban.
Saying stuff like this: "TheFoxGuardian: Kys %%%%%%" can move you past the 14 day ban and move you straight to a permanent.

Your chat restrictions & 14 days suspension was already your 2nd chance, so you're too late in asking for an appeal. What really caught my attention is the two Twitch games which seems to show you intentionally feeding.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PM86qEEG,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-11-29T22:46:06.818+0000)
>
> "wrongfully"
> "permabanned"
> 
> Pick one.

I was wrongfully permabanned 7 months ago. 

Riot's decision was overturned and I was able to recover my account.
14-day ban was warning. Now it's too late to change.
Look on the bright side buddy; it's not a perma IP ban!

I think if you own up to your actions, aka acknowledge that what you did is wrong, then maybe, *maybe* you have a chance of reducing punishment, but not here on the boards, but by writing to riot support.
It's nice that you believe that, but it's your opinion agaisnt the stated guidelines you signed on in order to play this game.
